name: Nyako Restaurant
description:
Go from the owner of a small trailer with hot dogs to the owner of a large chain of rich restaurants. Manage them both yourself and hire and monitor the activities of your employees.

In the world of Nyako, several different peoples coexist at the same time: cat girls, people and representatives of rare peoples. Each of the peoples has its own tastes and wishes, it will be difficult to please everyone at once.

The game combines several genres. From tycoon to a certain semblance of rogue-lite elements.

    Short description:
  • Building your own restaurant empire
  • Cat girls
  • Direct food preparation
  • Freelance situations that you will often face
  • Development of relationships and personal qualities of your character
